name: Guns of Wars Multiplayer (iOS/Android)
description:
The game is on!  Play with your friends in DeathMatch!

Master the Touch Controls, show your skills and own those noobs.

New multiplayer first Person Shooter simulator!

Play in any place you want. Forget consoles, Tv and relax wherever you want.

Features:
-Two styles of characters.
-DeathMatch Mode.
-5 Available Weapons.
-Easy to use Touch Controls.

*Coming soon*:
*Skin colors for your character
*Zombies?
